task_description: Facing the building to your North-East (approx. 41°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full height of the building to estimate it, but the top is currently cut off, so I will look up.
I can now see the full height of the building, from the ground to the roof, so I will count the floors to estimate the total height.
